name: task-manager
description: Task Manager Application with Angular frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build:client
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:client
scripts.clean: cd client && rm -rf dist && cd ../api && rm -rf dist
